#  Individual Research Plan -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/doctoral-students/individual-research-plan
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:49

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Individual Research Plan 

We kindly inform that in accordance with Article 202(1) of the Law on Higher Education and Science, 
doctoral student
 in consultation with supervisor(s), develops an 
developes an Individual Research Plan
 and submits it to the Director of the Doctoral School 
no later than 12 months from the date of commencement of training.

Please make Individual Research Plans on the appropriate forms available below.

Stopka

AGH University Doctoral School
build. A3, I floor, room 118
al. Mickiewicza 30
30-059 Krakow
